TWCRLFLogicalModel 1..1Base臺灣癌症登記長表之資料模型
CaseConfirmation 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之個案確認
OrganizationIdentifier 1..1Identifier1.1 申報醫院代碼
Subject 1..1Element癌症登記之病患資訊
MedicalRecordNumber 1..1Identifier1.2 病歷號碼
Name 1..1HumanName1.3 姓名
IDNumber 1..1Identifier1.4 身分證統一編號
Gender 1..1code1.5 性別
BirthDate 1..1date1.6 出生日期
PostalCode 1..1string1.7 戶籍地代碼
CancerConfirmation 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之癌症確認
Diagnosis 1..1Element癌症個案之診斷與分類
DiagnosisAge 1..1Age2.1 診斷年齡
SequenceNumber 1..1CodeableConcept2.2 癌症發生順序號碼
ClassOfCase 1..1CodeableConcept2.3 個案分類
ClassOfDiagnosisStatus 1..1CodeableConcept2.3.1 診斷狀態分類
ClassOfTreatmentStatus 1..1CodeableConcept2.3.2 治療狀態分類
DateOfInitialDiagnosis 1..1dateTime2.5 最初診斷日期
DiagnosticConfirmation 1..1CodeableConcept2.11 癌症確診方式
DateOfFirstContact 1..1dateTime2.4 首次就診日期
PrimaryCancer 1..1Element原發性癌症
PrimarySite 1..1CodeableConcept2.6 原發部位
Laterality 1..1CodeableConcept2.7 側性
Histology 1..1CodeableConcept2.8 組織型態
BehaviorCode 1..1CodeableConcept2.9 性態碼
GradeClinical 1..1CodeableConcept2.10.1 臨床分級/分化
GradePathological 1..1CodeableConcept2.10.2 病理分級/分化
DateOfFirstMicroscopicConfirmation 1..1dateTime2.12 首次顯微鏡檢證實日期
TumorSize 1..1Quantity2.13 腫瘤大小
PerineuralInvasion 1..1CodeableConcept2.13.1 神經侵襲
LymphVascularInvasion 1..1CodeableConcept2.13.2 淋巴管或血管侵犯
RegionalLymphNodes 1..1Element區域淋巴結
RegionalLymphNodesExamined 1..1Quantity2.14 區域淋巴結檢查數目
RegionalLymphNodesPositive 1..1Quantity2.15 區域淋巴結侵犯數目
StageOfInitialDiagnosis 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之癌症最初診斷期別
SurgicalDiagnosticAndStagingProcedure 1..1Element診斷性及分期性手術處置
SurgicalDiagnosticAndStagingProcedureAtThisFacilityDate 1..1dateTime3.1 診斷性及分期性手術處置日期
SurgicalDiagnosticAndStagingProcedureAtOtherFacility 1..1CodeableConcept3.2 外院診斷性及分期性手術處置
SurgicalDiagnosticAndStagingProcedureAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept3.3 申報醫院診斷性及分期性手術處置
Clinical 1..1Element臨床分期
ClinicalT 1..1CodeableConcept3.4 臨床T
ClinicalN 1..1CodeableConcept3.5 臨床N
ClinicalM 1..1CodeableConcept3.6 臨床M
ClinicalStage 1..1CodeableConcept3.7 臨床期別組合
ClinicalOtherStaging 1..1CodeableConcept3.19 其他分期系統期別（臨床分期）
ClinicalStageDescriptor 1..1CodeableConcept3.8 臨床分期字根/字首
Pathologic 1..1Element臨床分期
PathologicT 1..1CodeableConcept3.10 病理T
PathologicN 1..1CodeableConcept3.11 病理N
PathologicM 1..1CodeableConcept3.12 病理M
PathologicStage 1..1CodeableConcept3.13 病理期別組合

PathologicStageDescriptor 1..1CodeableConcept3.14 病理分期字根/字首
AJCCEditionAndChapter 1..1CodeableConcept3.16 AJCC癌症分期版本與章節
OtherStagingSystem 1..1CodeableConcept3.17 其他分期系統
FirstCourseOfTreatment 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之首次療程
FirstCourseOfTreatmentDate 1..1dateTime4.1 首次療程開始日期
DateOfFirstSurgicalProcedure 1..1dateTime4.1.1 首次手術日期
SurgicalProcedureOfPrimarySite 1..1Element原發部位手術方式

MinimallyInvasiveSurgery 1..1CodeableConcept4.1.4.1 微創手術
SurgicalMarginsOfThePrimarySite 1..1CodeableConcept4.1.5 原發部位手術邊緣

ScopeOfRegionalLymphNodeSurgery 1..1Element區域淋巴結手術範圍

SurgicalProcedureOtherSite 1..1Element其他部位手術方式

ReasonForNoSurgeryOfPrimarySite 1..1CodeableConcept4.1.10 原發部位未手術原因
RT 1..1Element放射治療
RTTargetSummary 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.1.1 放射治療臨床標靶體積摘要
RTModality 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.1.2 放射治療儀器
RTStarted 1..1dateTime4.2.1.3 放射治療開始日期
RTEnded 1..1dateTime4.2.1.4 放射治療結束日期
RTStatus 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.1.2 放射治療儀器
SequenceOfRadiotherapyAndSurgery 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.1.5 放射治療與手術順序
SequenceOfLocoregionalTherapyAndSystemicTherapy 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.1.6 區域治療與全身性治療順序
EBRT 1..1Element體外放射治療
EBRTTechnique 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.2.1 體外放射治療技術
CTVH 1..1Element最高放射劑量臨床標靶體積摘要
TargetOfCTVH 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.2.2.1 最高放射劑量臨床標靶體積
DoseToCTVH 1..1Quantity4.2.2.2.2 最高放射劑量臨床標靶體積劑量
NumberOfFractionsToCTVH 1..1Quantity4.2.2.2.3 最高放射劑量臨床標靶體積治療次數
CTVL 1..1Element較低放射劑量臨床標靶體積摘要
TargetOfCTVL 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.2.3.1 較低放射劑量臨床標靶體積
DoseToCTVL 1..1Quantity4.2.2.3.2 較低放射劑量臨床標靶體積劑量
NumberOfFractionsToCTVL 1..1Quantity4.2.2.3.3 較低放射劑量臨床標靶體積治療次數
OtherRT 1..1Element其他放射治療
OtherRTModality 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.3.1 其他放射治療儀器
RTTechnique 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.3.2 其他放射治療技術
TargetOfCTVH 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.3.3.1 其他放射治療臨床標靶體積
DoseToCTVH 1..1Quantity4.2.3.3.2 其他放射治療臨床標靶體積劑量
NumberOfFractionsToCTVH 1..1Quantity4.2.3.3.3 其他放射治療臨床標靶體積治療次數
SystemicTherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.1 全身性治療開始日期
Chemotherapy 1..1Element化學治療
ChemotherapyAtOtherFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.2 外院化學治療
ChemotherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.3 申報醫院化學治療
ChemotherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.4 申報醫院化學治療開始日期
HormoneSteroidTherapy 1..1Element荷爾蒙/類固醇治療
HormoneSteroidTherapyAtOtherFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.5 外院荷爾蒙/類固醇治療
HormoneSteroidTherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.6 申報醫院荷爾蒙/類固醇治療
HormoneSteroidTherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.7 申報醫院荷爾蒙/類固醇治療開始日期
Immunotherapy 1..1Element免疫治療
ImmunotherapyAtOtherFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.8 外院免疫治療
ImmunotherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.9 申報醫院免疫治療
ImmunotherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.10 申報醫院免疫治療開始日期
HematologicTransplantAndEndocrineProcedure 1..1Element骨髓/幹細胞移植或內分泌處置

HematologicTransplantAndEndocrineProcedureStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.12 申報醫院骨髓/幹細胞移植或內分泌處置開始日期
TargetedTherapy 1..1Element標靶治療
TargetedTherapyAtOtherFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.13 外院標靶治療
TargetedTherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.14 申報醫院標靶治療
TargetedTherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.15 申報醫院標靶治療開始日期
PalliativeCare 1..1CodeableConcept4.4 申報醫院緩和照護
OtherTreatment 1..1Element其他治療
OtherTreatmentAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.5.1 其他治療
OtherTreatmentStarted 1..1dateTime4.5.2 其他治療開始日期
Outcome 1..1BackboneElement結果
FirstRecurrence 1..1Element首次復發
DateOfFirstRecurrenceOrCancerStatusFollowUp 1..1dateTime5.1 首次復發或癌症狀態追蹤日期
TypeOfFirstRecurrence 1..1CodeableConcept5.2 首次復發形式
DateOfLastContactOrDeath 1..1dateTime5.3 最後聯絡或死亡日期
VitalStatus 1..1dateTime5.4 生存狀態
CaseAdministration 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之個案行政
AbstractedBy 1..1Identifier6.1 摘錄者
OtherFactors 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之其他因子
Height 1..1Quantity7.1 身高
Weight 1..1Quantity7.2 體重
SmokingBehavior 1..1CodeableConcept7.3 吸菸行為
BetelNutChewingBehavior 1..1CodeableConcept7.4 嚼檳榔行為
DrinkingBehavior 1..1CodeableConcept7.5 喝酒行為
AssessmentOfPerformanceStatusBeforeTreatment 1..1CodeableConcept7.6 首次治療前生活功能狀態評估
SSF 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之癌症部位特定因子
SSF1 1..1CodeableConcept8.1 癌症部位特定因子1
SSF2 1..1CodeableConcept8.2 癌症部位特定因子2
SSF3 1..1CodeableConcept8.3 癌症部位特定因子3
SSF4 1..1CodeableConcept8.4 癌症部位特定因子4
SSF5 1..1CodeableConcept8.5 癌症部位特定因子5
SSF6 1..1CodeableConcept8.6 癌症部位特定因子6
SSF7 1..1CodeableConcept8.7 癌症部位特定因子7
SSF8 1..1CodeableConcept8.8 癌症部位特定因子8
SSF9 1..1CodeableConcept8.9 癌症部位特定因子9

name: TWCRLFLogicalModel
title: 臺灣癌症登記長表邏輯模型

element.short: 臺灣癌症登記長表之資料模型
element.definition: 臺灣癌症登記長表之資料模型
Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
